docs.text: CLI Reference This page provides documentation for our command line tools. thoth Usage: thoth [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]... Options: --help Show this message and exit. a Add a new todo Usage: thoth a [OPTIONS] TODO_STRING Options: --help Show this message and exit. init Init the application Usage: thoth init [OPTIONS] Options: --help Show this message and exit. ls List all todo Usage: thoth ls [OPTIONS] Options: --help Show this message and exit. rm Remove a todo Usage: thoth rm [OPTIONS] Options: --help Show this message and exit. s Search for a todo Usage: thoth s [OPTIONS] Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: Devellopers Documentation todo.txt todo.txt Pytest pytest tests/ Mkdocs commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Package build Build python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip python3 -m pip install --upgrade build python3 -m build Upload Python Packaging
